channel.title: New to Web designing, forum Rs style i made so far
channel.description:
Hey, i was inspired to make a rs theme smf sheet, of this release
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,489784.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,489784.0.html[/url]
And i kinda fell into it and spended a few hours to redesign everything, it is not as good as i had in mind, but i just started with html/css.
[img]http://i32.servimg.com/u/f32/16/52/06/54/ld_for10.png[/img]

item.title: New to Web designing, forum Rs style i made so far
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

soul raever:

I’m pretty sure the top right is supposed to be saying something but yea F*#ked if I can read it. (change font colours or give a background colour to that area to make it readable)

That’s the login form.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

Ruby:

The navbar can be doing with some serious work. Along with the banner area. The actual board part is nice though, good job.

Yes.

I love the background though.
